Event.name: Reassuring
Event.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>Speaker</fen> conveys a <fen>Message</fen> to an <fen>Experiencer</fen> in order to reassure them about a <fen>Situation</fen>; <fen>Medium</fen> and the <fen>Means</fen> of the communication also may be expressed.
<ex><fex name="Speaker">We</fex> <t>reassured</t> <fex name="Experiencer">him</fex> <fex name="Msg">that his decision was sound</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Speaker
Arg.definition: <def-root>The sentient entity that uses language in the written or spoken modality to reassure another person. <ex><fex name="Speaker">He</fex> <t>reassured</t> her that she was his favorite ice-skating star. </ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Experiencer
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Experiencer</fen> receives reassurance from the <fen>Speaker</fen>. <ex>He tried to <t>reassure</t> <fex name="Exp">his potential customers</fex> that his company not only offered the best service, but also the most competitive prices. </ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Message
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Message</fen> is a proposition or set of propositions that the <fen>Speaker</fen> wants the <fen>Experiencer</fen> to believe in order to feel reassured.
<ex>How do you <t>reassure</t> them <fex name="Msg">that you really like them</fex>? </ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Situation
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Situation</fen> is the problem plaguing the <fen>Experiencer</fen>, about which the <fen>Speaker</fen> reassures them.
<ex>The policeman <t>reassured</t> him <fex name="Situation">about the safety of the neighborhood</fex>. </ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Medium
Arg.definition: <def-root>The physical or abstract setting in which the <fen>Message</fen> is conveyed. </def-root>

Arg.name: Amount_of_reassurance
Arg.definition: <def-root>The amount of reassurance given. <ex>He never really <fex name="Amount_of_reassurance">fully</fex> <t>reassured</t> me about the situation.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Manner
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Manner</fen> in which the <fen>Speaker</fen> reassures the <fex name="Exp">Experiencer</fex>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Means
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Means</fen> by which the <fen>Speaker</fen> reassures the <fen>Experiencer</fen>.
<ex>Him mother reassured him <fex name="Mns">with a pat on the back</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Time
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Time</fen> at which the reassurance takes place.</def-root>

lexUnit.name: reassurance.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: an act that allays doubts and fears

lexUnit.name: reassure.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: allay the doubts and fears of
